title: [Large-Scale] Blended Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for University Entrance Exam Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level foundational mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Weekend Intensive Program for Working Professionals, Featuring a Blended Learning Environment Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Participants improve mathematical reasoning skills required for college entrance exams by over 30%.

Participants clearly describe step-by-step problem-solving processes for ≥8 out of 10 presented mathematical problems during a 2–4-week course, using accurate mathematical terminology and symbols in their answers.
Participants conduct personalized learning gap analyses by comparing pre- and post-assessment results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
